Question.Subject: Screen name ideas? (10pts!)?
Question.Content:
Ohkayy, so my names summer rose. dancing is one of my passions, along with: drawing,music,hanging with friends, twilight,the vampire diaries& my ipodd? i LOVEEEE the beachh! i love ninjas,the word"peace", spongebob, cupcakes, hello kitty, cookie monster,the words'superstar' im pretty random& funny.
"I H@+3 \/\/h3n P30p!3 +@!k !ik3 +hi$"--> translation'i hate when people talk with that lettering junk" ohh and i like words like woah,dang, etcc. but you dont have put it on the namee.
uhmm thats about itt, thxx(; ohh and the whole point of me giving you info about me is so you can incooperate into the screenname... i dont want ones that have absoulutely NOTHING to do with mee. thx

Answer.Content:
he is a few screen name ideas

Answer.Reference: The people that give me a thumbs down don't understand my clever answers. ouck fff is an anagram of f off and the measures are all anagrams of masturbation and it's been put in a sentence made up by me !
